price: 64. Bazongisaki mayele na bango mpe balobi: Ya sólo, bino nde bozali babubi.
arabic: فَرَجَعُوٓاْ إِلَىٰٓ أَنفُسِهِمۡ فَقَالُوٓاْ إِنَّكُمۡ أَنتُمُ ٱلظَّٰلِمُونَ

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: farajaʿū ilā anfusihim faqālū innakum antumu al-ẓālimūna
